text: i had poa and math tuition  it was fun and enjoyable a teacher name cheryl was so helpful and patient she would find ways to explain to me in different ways and made sure i understood what the question was asking she would always encourage me when i feel like giving up good 😊

My 2 girls, 7 & 3 have been attending Phonics (3yo) and English (7yo) classes for about 6 months. They really look forward to attend the class (more than going to school). I personally felt Teacher Marylene is very engaging and knows how to manage the kids well. She is also very patience and give useful feedbacks and suggestion.

It’s really an enjoyable learning time for the kids 👍🏻 👍🏻 👍🏻

Ms Cheryl helped to arrange last minute bio crash course for my daughter despite being on maternity leave. She was very very helpful! The tutor was patient, understanding and knowledgeable. My daughter felt so much more confident n relieved after the classes. We are very thankful to them! :)

My girl, aged have been attending learning Phonics for the past year. She looks forward to classes every Saturday. Teacher Marylene has been very patient and engaging during lessons. She give regular feedbacks and provide guidance to parents on areas of improvement.

My girl really enjoys the weekly lessons 😄

My daughter has been attending Spring Ahead education center and she absolutely loves the center. Her teacher is amazingand her teaching program is great. My daughter has started words and sentences in a very short period of time. Through the teacher's classes and lessons my daughter is very confident in picking up a book to identify the words and read. With the one to one time with the teacher she is learning tremendously fast. Great teacher -great education center.
